verses.verse: And he <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> There was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G3623>steward;<s%> and the <S%G3778>same<s%> was <S%G1225>accused<s%> to him that he had <S%G1287>wasted<s%> his goods. <S%G5224><s%>

And he <S%G5455>called<s%> him, and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>How<s%> is it that I <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> of you? <S%G591>give<s%> an <S%G3056>account<s%> of your <S%G3622>stewardship;<s%> for you <S%G1410>may<s%> be <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2089>longer<s%> steward. <S%G3621><s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G3622>steward<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do?<s%> for my <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G851>takes<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> from me the <S%G3622>stewardship:<s%> I cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2480><s%> <S%G4626>dig;<s%> to <S%G1871>beg<s%> I am ashamed. <S%G153><s%>

I am <S%G1097>resolved<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> to <S%G4160>do,<s%> that, <S%G3752>when<s%> I am <S%G3179>put<s%> out of the <S%G3622>stewardship,<s%> they may <S%G1209>receive<s%> me <S%G1519>into<s%> their houses. <S%G3624><s%>

<S%G2532>So<s%> he <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of his <S%G2962>lord's<s%> debtors <S%G5533><s%> to him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G4214>How<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3784>owe<s%> you to my lord? <S%G2962><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> An <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G943>measures<s%> of <S%G1637>oil.<s%> And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1209>Take<s%> your <S%G1121>bill,<s%> and <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G5030>quickly,<s%> and <S%G1125>write<s%> fifty. <S%G4004><s%>

<S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he to <S%G2087>another,<s%> And <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3784>owe<s%> you? And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> An <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G2884>measures<s%> of <S%G4621>wheat.<s%> And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1209>Take<s%> your <S%G1121>bill,<s%> and <S%G1125>write<s%> fourscore. <S%G3589><s%>

And the <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G1867>commended<s%> the <S%G93>unjust<s%> <S%G3622>steward,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G5430>wisely:<s%> for the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> are in their <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G5429>wiser<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>

And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G4160>Make<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G5384>friends<s%> of the <S%G3126>mammon<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness;<s%> that, <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G1587>fail,<s%> they may <S%G1209>receive<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> habitations. <S%G4633><s%>

He that is <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in that which is <S%G1646>least<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G4183>much:<s%> and he that is <S%G94>unjust<s%> in the <S%G1646>least<s%> is <S%G94>unjust<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in much. <S%G4183><s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you have not <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in the <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> <S%G3126>mammon,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> will <S%G4100>commit<s%> to <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G4100>trust<s%> the true <S%G228><s%> riches?

And <S%G1487>if<s%> you have not <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in that which is <S%G245>another<s%> <S%G245>man's,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> shall <S%G1325>give<s%> you that which is <S%G5212>your<s%> own?

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3610>servant<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2962>masters:<s%> for <S%G2228>either<s%> he will <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G1520>one,<s%> and <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2087>other;<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> else he will <S%G472>hold<s%> to the <S%G1520>one,<s%> and <S%G2706>despise<s%> the <S%G2087>other.<s%> You cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and mammon. <S%G3126><s%>
And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> who were <S%G5366>covetous,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things: and they <S%G1592>derided<s%> him.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, You are they <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1344>justify<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G444>men;<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts:<s%> for that which is <S%G5308>highly<s%> esteemed <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> is <S%G946>abomination<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

The <S%G3551>law<s%> and the prophets <S%G4396><s%> were <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G2491>John:<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> that <S%G5119>time<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2097>preached,<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> man <S%G971>presses<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> it.

And it is <S%G2123>easier<s%> for <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G3928>pass,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> pronunciation <S%G2762>mark<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> to fail. <S%G4098><s%>

Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G630>puts<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G1060>marries<s%> <S%G2087>another,<s%> <S%G3431>commits<s%> <S%G3431>adultery:<s%> and whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1060>marries<s%> her that is <S%G630>put<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> from her <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G3431>commits<s%> adultery. <S%G3431><s%>

There was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2532>which<s%> was <S%G1737>clothed<s%> in <S%G4209>purple<s%> and fine <S%G1040>linen,<s%> and <S%G2165>fared<s%> <S%G2988>sumptuously<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> day: <S%G2250><s%>

And there was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4434>beggar<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G906>laid<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> his <S%G4440>gate,<s%> full of sores, <S%G1669><s%>

And <S%G1937>desiring<s%> to be <S%G5526>fed<s%> with the <S%G5589>crumbs<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> from the <S%G4145>rich<s%> man's <S%G5132>table:<s%> moreover <S%G235><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2965>dogs<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G621>licked<s%> his sores. <S%G1668><s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that the <S%G4434>beggar<s%> <S%G599>died,<s%> and was <S%G667>carried<s%> by the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G11>Abraham's<s%> <S%G2859>bosom:<s%> the <S%G4145>rich<s%> man <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G599>died,<s%> and was buried; <S%G2290><s%>

And in <S%G86>hell<s%> he <S%G1869>lift<s%> up his <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> in <S%G931>torments,<s%> and <S%G3708>sees<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G575>off,<s%> and <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> in his bosom. <S%G2859><s%>

And he <S%G5455>cried<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me, and <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus,<s%> that he may <S%G911>dip<s%> the <S%G206>tip<s%> of his <S%G1147>finger<s%> in <S%G5204>water,<s%> and <S%G2711>cool<s%> my <S%G1100>tongue;<s%> for I am <S%G3600>tormented<s%> in <S%G5026>this<s%> flame. <S%G5395><s%>

But <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5043>Son,<s%> <S%G3415>remember<s%> that you in your <S%G2222>lifetime<s%> <S%G618>received<s%> your <S%G18>good<s%> things, and <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> things: but <S%G3568>now<s%> he is <S%G3870>comforted,<s%> and you are tormented. <S%G3600><s%>

And <S%G1909>beside<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5125>this,<s%> <S%G3342>between<s%> us and you there is a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5490>gulf<s%> <S%G4741>fixed:<s%> <S%G3704>so<s%> that they which <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G1224>pass<s%> from <S%G1782>hence<s%> to you cannot; <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> they <S%G1276>pass<s%> to us, that would come from there. <S%G1564><s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G2065>pray<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> that you would <S%G3992>send<s%> him to my <S%G3962>father's<s%> house: <S%G3624><s%>

For I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G80>brothers;<s%> that he may <S%G1263>testify<s%> to them, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> of torment. <S%G931><s%>
<S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, They <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> and the <S%G4396>prophets;<s%> let them <S%G191>hear<s%> them.

And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3780>No,<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham:<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> to them from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> they will repent. <S%G3340><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1487>If<s%> they <S%G191>hear<s%> not <S%G3475>Moses<s%> and the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> will they be <S%G3982>persuaded,<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G450>rose<s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>
